it.hackcaffebabe.ioutil.file

Class Zipper

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.hackcaffebabe.ioutil.file.Zipper

  • public final class Zipper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provide the common method to create a Zip file.
    How to use:
    
 Zipper zip = new Zipper( new File("~/path/to/zip/arch.zip") );
 for( File f : myListOfFiles )
 zip.addFile(f)
 zip.softZip();
    See doc of previous method to decide each one to use.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Zipper(java.io.File zip)
      Instance a Zipper object with the full path of the zip file.

      This method add a list of files to the archive.

      This method create the zip file in every case.

      void softZip()
      This method doesn't create the zip file if already exists into specified directory, otherwise will be create.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Zipper

        public Zipper(java.io.File zip)
       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
              java.io.IOException
        Instance a Zipper object with the full path of the zip file.
        Parameters:
        zip - File must be a file .zip, otherwise will be thrown an IllegalArgumentException.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if arguments are null.
        java.io.IOException - if parent folder of zip can not be written.

    • Method Detail

      • softZip

        public void softZip()
             throws java.io.IOException
        This method doesn't create the zip file if already exists into specified directory, otherwise will be create.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if already exists into specified directory or it incurred a problem while opening the zip file.

      • forceZip

        public void forceZip()
              throws java.io.IOException
        This method create the zip file in every case. If zip already exists it will deleted and a new one will be create.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if it incurred a problem while creating the zip file.

      • setZip

        public void setZip(java.io.File f)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method change the zip path.
        Parameters:
        f - File the path of the zip archive.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if file given is null.

      • addFiles

        public void addFiles(java.util.List<java.io.File> lst)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                     java.io.IOException
        This method add a list of files to the archive.
        Parameters:
        lst - List of File to add.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if argument given is null or empty list.
        java.io.IOException - if there is a file in the list that doesn't exists.

      • addFile

        public void addFile(java.io.File f)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                    java.io.IOException
        This method add a single file to the archive.
        Parameters:
        f - File the file to add.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if file is null.
        java.io.IOException - if file doesn't exists.

      • getPath

        public java.io.File getPath()
        Returns:
        File the zip path.

      • getFiles

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.io.File> getFiles()
        Returns:
        ArrayList of File.
